main event: A round white and/or silver object, the size of a basketball, was observed on the ground for 1 hour and 30 minutes in Tahoka, Texas.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 1 hour and 30 minutes,The object was described as round and light-colored,The report concluded that the sighting was likely a balloon,Two T-33 aircraft attempted to intercept the object but were unable to reach its altitude,The sighting occurred on December 13, 1957.
sighted object: one round white and/or silver object
